name: Space Merge
description:
Space Merge - Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 (Theme: Stronger Together)

The decade long battle between mankind and the alien species 'virty' has reached its climax, as there are constant battles between the two fleets.

Even though both sides have had severe losses, the virty have been pushing forward. They are about to reach the fleet of the commander, the highest-ranking member of the army.

The commander has sent you, their deputy, to scout for the enemy and look, if there are any survivors of past battles.

On your travel you can merge with other ships of your fleet, to get even stronger.

Controls

Move: Left Click

Interact/Shoot: Right Click

Stats Menu: S

Minimap: M

Pause: Escape 

Made with EngineUnityCodeC# in Jetbrains Rider
Source Code on GitHub
ArtPix2d, Krite, Paint.netSFXsfxrMusicMusescore
